QuestData.Title: Warlord of the Amani
QuestData.Description: Da Amani been rebuildin' their forces and dey raised up a new warlord to lead dem, $n. He be called Daakara da Invincible, but we be seein' whether he lives up to the name or not.$B$BYa must first defeat all his lieutenants to clear da way before ya can face this Daakara. Defeat him and put an end to da ambitions of da Zandalari and da Amani!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the new Amani warlord, Daakara.
QuestData.CompletionText: Dis new warlord must fall before da Zandalari foothold here becomes permanent.
